summary: Completed comprehensive testing of JPM NFC business cards platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Critical frontend-backend integration issue identified preventing dashboard functionality.

critical_bugs.issue: Multiple 401 Unauthorized errors when fetching profiles after successful login
critical_bugs.impact: Dashboard shows empty state despite profiles existing in backend
critical_bugs.symptoms: Session token not being properly attached to API requests

critical_bugs.issue: Form input fields not accessible/loading properly
critical_bugs.impact: Cannot create new profiles via UI

integration_issues.issue: Session token from login not persisting for subsequent API calls
integration_issues.symptoms: Login succeeds but protected endpoints return 401 errors

passed_tests: Frontend Login UI and Authentication Flow
Frontend Dashboard UI Design and Branding
Public Profile Interactive Buttons (Call, WhatsApp, vCard Download)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical authentication session issue: Frontend not properly sending session tokens with API requests after login. This prevents dashboard from loading profiles and form functionality. Backend APIs are fully functional - issue is in frontend axios configuration or session management.

success_percentage.frontend: 40% - UI works but core functionality blocked by auth issue
success_percentage.integration: 30% - Public profiles work, admin dashboard fails
